title: Step 19

challengeFiles.name: main
challengeFiles.contents:
import secrets
import string


def generate_password(length):
    # Define the possible characters for the password
    letters = string.ascii_letters
    digits = string.digits
    symbols = string.punctuation

    # Combine all characters
    all_characters = letters + digits + symbols
    password = ''
    # Generate password
    for _ in range(length):
        password += secrets.choice(all_characters)
challengeFiles.seed:
import secrets
import string


def generate_password(length):
    # Define the possible characters for the password
    letters = string.ascii_letters
    digits = string.digits
    symbols = string.punctuation

    # Combine all characters
    all_characters = letters + digits + symbols
    password = ''
    # Generate password
    for _ in range(length):
        password += secrets.choice(all_characters)

tests.text: You should return password at the end of your function.

description: After the loop, add a return statement to your function so it returns the password variable.
